EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND 
• Electronics and Telecommunication Engineer – Hue University of Sciences – 
Vietnam 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
• Over 7 years experience about native iOS. 
• Over 1 year experience about Android. 
• About 2 years experience about React Native. 
• About 9 months experience about native Xamarin (iOS). 
• Over 3 years experience with team leader and technical leader role. 
• Training and working with junior/fresher developers. 
• Be able to read, write, communicate and understand English well. 
• Planning and problem-solving skill. 
• Ambition, passion, organization and responsibility 
• Having ability to work well under pressure, teamwork or individual 
• Strong analytical skills and research. 
Le Cat Binh’s CV - Confidential 
1 
SOFTWARE 
• Having experience in Objective-C programming (for Xcode 10) 
• Having experience in Swift 4 programming (for Xcode 10) 
• Having experience in programming with Java (for Android) 
• Having experience in programming with C# (for Xamarin) 
• Having experience in programming with React Native (Javascript) 
• Having basic knowledge in programming with C/C++ (for KeilC) 
• Having basic knowledge about Nodejs, mongoDB, AWS. 
• Having good skills in using SourceTree, GIT and SVN. 
• Having good skills in applying Cocoapods. 
• Having good skills in UML, detail design. 
HARDWARE 
• Having basic knowledge about embedded system with ARM microprocessor 
• Having basic knowledge about IC design 
OPERATING SYSTEMS 
• MacOS 
• Windows, Linux 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
 FPT Software: from Oct/2016 – Present 
➢ React Native Projects: 
• Team Size: 5

research the new technology.

- Using Redux and Redux Saga for working with API and management 
state of the app. 
- Offline mode (using Redux Persist and React-Native-Offline). 
- Calendars, Charts UI 
- Upload/Download data with server. 
- Processing background, multi-threads and multi-tasks.

https://itunes.apple.com/vn/app/jokes-story/id1303140660?mt=8 )

- Support and guide for members

server to get data, using UIKit and Foundation Framework to show data 
(TableView and CollectionView).

- The app also display advertising of Google/Facebook (at bottom app).

- Network, GCD, UIKit/Foundation Framwork. 
- Facebook Audience Network, Google SDK. 
- Push Notification (Local).
